name: Rose
description: A woody perennial flowering plant of the genus Rosa.

name: Tulip
description: A bulbous spring-flowering plant of the lily family.

name: Lavender
description: A small aromatic evergreen shrub of the mint family.

name: Orchid
description: A diverse and widespread family of flowering plants.

name: Sunflower
description: A tall, bright and cheerful flower, known for its large heads.

name: Daisy
description: A simple yet sophisticated flower with a friendly vibe.
growingConditions: Full to partial sun, well-drained soil.
